title: Top Life Coaching Tips: Live Each Day with More Peace, Passion, Energy and Joy
description: Life Coach Dr. Sheri Kaye Hoff, PhD's, Top Life Coaching Tips contains the very best of her Coaching Tips, Tools, and Techniques for you to apply in your daily life. "Welcome to my Top Life Coaching Tips, 4th Edition. I created this book for you. I am sharing these tips to help you live each day with more peace, passion, energy, and joy. You may want to browse through all of the tips at one sitting- or read one each day...you choose. Record your thoughts and dreams. Mark it up and treat it like a journal. I want you to be inspired and to live the life of your dreams- the life that you were meant to live. I consider the most essential piece of success is to guard and guide one's thought life. Many of my tips are directly related to how you think and its impact on your life."
author: Sheri Kaye Hoff
